Feature Services: Feature Analysis Service

Main factory for feature analysis operations.

class mdxplain.feature.services.feature_analysis_service.FeatureAnalysisService(pipeline_data: PipelineData)

Main service for accessing analysis operations on feature types.

__init__(pipeline_data: PipelineData) → None

Initialize feature analysis service.

Parameters

pipeline_dataPipelineData

Pipeline data container

property distances: DistancesAnalysisService

Access distance-specific analysis operations.

property contacts: ContactsAnalysisService

Access contact-specific analysis operations.

property torsions: TorsionsAnalysisService

Access torsion-specific analysis operations.

property dssp: DSSPAnalysisService

Access DSSP-specific analysis operations.

property sasa: SASAAnalysisService

Access SASA-specific analysis operations.

property coordinates: CoordinatesAnalysisService

Access coordinate-specific analysis operations.
